document.full_text: "rio," the 3d animated misadventure of a brazilian macaw, soared at the international box office, earning about $55 million in its opening weekend, its distributor said on sunday.
document.title: cartoon birds, bunnies rule world box office
lines_and_colors: "rio," the 3d animated misadventure of a brazilian macaw, soared at the international box office, earning about $55 million in its opening weekend, its distributor said on sunday.
